SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Admin Experience: Manage Storefront Metadata More Efficiently and Confidently

Equip your admins with better tools for managing B2B Commerce for Visualforce data. Support development and troubleshooting efforts with more context for multiple configuration cache entries. And, admins whose native language is French or German can now enjoy a more efficient experience with a localized CC Admin.

Quickly Identify and Track Your Changed Configuration Settings
Keep your configuration cache history organized by adding a detailed label to each cache entry that you build. That's right—you no longer have to remember which cache entry corresponds to which set of configuration settings. Now, you can add a remark—up to 255 characters— to each cache entry so you can quickly test, revert, or troubleshoot changed settings.
Provide a Native Language Experience for French and German Admins
For admin users whose Salesforce user language is set to French or German, B2B Commerce for Visualforce now provides a localized experience. CC Admin labels, menus, and configuration settings are now available in both languages by default.
